name: Nothing Else Matters
description:
Description:

A kid finds itself in a ship, encouraged to find something called the One.

Controls:

[Left-click] to Move/Interact

[A], [D] to Rotate

The One answers (Spoiler):

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1d_tyjekzllTh2_wTy89ahVbQ2rLC8vIW1pPXMUtl...

A game created by Giorgos Kletsas

For Cowboy's 100 Dollar Game Jam in two days with themes:

1. Space - 2. Voxel - 3. Only one matters

Songs from Cowboy 8625: 

https://soundcloud.com/cowboy-8625/a-long-time-ago

https://soundcloud.com/cowboy-8625/almost-minecraft

Background: https://pixabay.com/photos/astronomy-bright-constellation-dark-1867616/

Voxel assets: Asset Store
